targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "PMV" WHERE ("roomID" = '') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(30m) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "PMV" WHERE ("roomID" = '') AND  time > now()+2h - 7d
SELECT mode("value") FROM "PMV" WHERE ("roomID" = '') AND  time > now()+2h - 7d
SELECT min("value") FROM "PMV" WHERE ("roomID" = '') AND  time > now()+2h - 7d
SELECT max("value") FROM "PMV" WHERE ("roomID" = '') AND  time > now()+2h - 7d

alert.message: PMV is outside the optimal range
alert.name: PMV Alerting
